abstract: In preliminary national late-night ratings, Conan O’Brien’s final “Tonight” show scored a booming 7 household rating, which was almost triple the number he had been averaging for months in that measure.
snippet: In preliminary national late-night ratings, Conan O’Brien’s final “Tonight” show scored a booming 7 household rating, which was almost triple the number he had been averaging for months in that measure.
lead_paragraph: Updated | 1:28 p.m. Conan O’Brien’s farewell fared spectacularly on Friday night, pulling in what is expected to be the biggest audience in late night since his own first night as host of the “Tonight” show in June.
